sentences.english: Mammoth’s tusk which was found during the construction.
sentences.chinese: 在建設電廠的時候，發現了猛獁的長牙。

sentences.english: Neanderthal man was able to kill woolly mammoths and bears.
sentences.chinese: 尼安德特人能夠捕殺渾身覆毛的猛獁象和熊。

sentences.english: One of the mammoths, you hope, is going to be your supper.
sentences.chinese: 你期望着這其中某頭猛獁象將會成爲你今天的晚餐。

sentences.english: The bodies of these mammoths were found throughout a wide swathe of northern Siberia.
sentences.chinese: 這些猛獁的屍體發現地點散在於西伯利亞。

sentences.english: An average weight of the 7 mammoths is 70 tons.
The average height of a Wooly Mammoth is about 11 feet tall.
sentences.chinese: 這些長毛猛獁的平均身高是11英尺。

sentences.english: HAS now been restored in the Palaeontological Museum in Leningrad.
sentences.chinese: 這一猛獁遺骸現已修復陳列在列寧格勒古生物博物館。

sentences.english: Besides the mammoths, some other animals pasture in this valley as well.
sentences.chinese: 除了猛獁象，還有一些其他動物在山谷牧場裏。

sentences.english: The larger Columbian mammoth lived further south.
sentences.chinese: 而體型較大的哥倫比亞猛獁則生活在較遠的南方。

sentences.english: But scientists are dying to see real mammoths.
sentences.chinese: 但是，科學家們仍渴望看到真正的猛獁。

sentences.english: Two mammoths dug up are on display in Beijing Museum of Natural History from April 28 to July 10.
sentences.chinese: 北京自然博物館將展出兩具猛獁的冰凍標本。

sentences.english: Between the mammoths and new entertainment center there are 4 tents installed for tourists. Inside the tent.
sentences.chinese: 猛獁和新的娛樂中心之間裏安了4個帳篷供遊客使用。

sentences.english: Mammoth hides were drawn over the timber and anchored with bones and stones.
sentences.chinese: 猛獁獸皮覆蓋於木樑上，底部由石頭和骨頭固定。

sentences.english: This animal hide covered framework was partially supported and braced with woolly mammoth bones.
sentences.chinese: 這種獸皮覆蓋的架構部分由羊毛包裹的猛獁骨骼支撐。

sentences.english: Mammoths, which are related with Asia elephants, are now extinct.
sentences.chinese: 猛獁象，這種與亞洲大象有關的生物，現在已經滅絕。

sentences.english: The mammoth fell into an ice crevasse.

definition: Hongshan district of Chifeng city 赤峰市, Inner Mongolia
Jean Auguste Dominique Ingres (1780-1867), French Neoclassical painter
